Package harrypotter.actions

Class Attack

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Action
      • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Affordance
        • harrypotter.HPAffordance
          • harrypotter.actions.Attack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionInterface, HPActionInterface, java.lang.Comparable<ActionInterface>
    public class Attack
extends HPAffordance
implements HPActionInterface
    Command to attack entities. This affordance is attached to all attackable entities
    Author:
    David.Squire@monash.edu (dsquire)

        public Attack​(HPEntityInterface theTarget,

        Parameters:
        theTarget - the target being attacked
        m - message renderer to display messages

      • canDo

        public boolean canDo​(HPActor a)
        Determine whether a particular HPActor a can attack the target.
        Specified by:
        canDo in interface HPActionInterface
        Parameters:
        a - the HPActor being queried
        Returns:
        true any HPActor can always try an attack, it just won't do much good unless this HPActor a has a suitable weapon.

      • act

        public void act​(HPActor a)
        Perform the Attack command on an entity.

        This method does not perform any damage (an attack) if,

        • The target of the Attack and the HPActor a are in the same Team
        • The HPActor a is holding an item without the WEAPON Affordance

        else it would damage the entity attacked, tires the attacker, and blunts any weapon used for the attack. TODO : check if the weapon has enough hitpoints and the attacker has enough energy before an attack.

        Specified by:
        act in interface HPActionInterface
        Parameters:
        a - the HPActor who is attacking
        See Also:
        HPActor.isDead(), Team
